name: JetPackStick
description:
An exciting game about the world-famous Stickman.

You have to dodge the burning lasers, collect coins and, if necessary, replenish the supply of hearts.

Control is as simple as possible: by tapping on the screen, our hero takes off.Good luck!

Автоматчики

Kapturenko Artem Yegorovich, Seregin Alexey Nikolaevich, Smolnikov Arseniy Vyacheslavovich, Nazarova Elizaveta Konstantinovna

Captain (Programmer): Artem Kapturenko

Designers: Seregin Alexey Nikolaevich, Smolnikov Arseniy Vyacheslavovich, Nazarova Elizaveta Konstantinovna

Background music by: https://soundcloud.com/user-658112323?ref=clipboard&p=i&c=1&utm_source=clipboard...
